Random home

09 March 2012 - San Francisco

  1. 127.0.0.1 Is the default IP address for localhost

  2. public void printf(String s, Object...args) the 3 dots is call varargs. It means you can pass 0 or more arguments. Its a shortcut to creating array manually

  3. Convert integer to binary representation

for(int i=0; i<32; i++)
sum+=( num >> i ) & 1;
System.out.println( sum );

OR

for(int i=0; i<32; i++)
  cout<<(n<0)      //shift left, then check (n<0? '1' : '0')
   n*=2;          //this will cause overflow

  1. View if port is running a process lsof -w -n -i tcp:8888 then you can kill the port by doing kill [pid]

  2. Remove three larges int in an array function

//@param array and size of array
void reduce(int a[], in& n)
{
    int i, j, k=3, max;
    while(k--)
    {
        //find maximum
        for(max=a[0]; i=1; i<n; i++)
            if(a[i] > max) max=a[i];
    
        //eliminate the duplicate
        for(j=i=0; i<n; i++)
            if(a[i]!=max) a[j++]=a[i]   //moving j++ only when a[i] is not equal to max
    
    //changing the size of array to new size
    n=j;
    }
}
